Absorb.description: You attempt to absorb some of an enemy’s health. Make a melee attack on a Pokémon. On a hit, the Pokémon takes 1d6 + MOVE grass damage. Half the damage done is restored by the user. At Higher levels: The base damage of this attack increases to 2d6 at level 5, 3d6 At level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.

Acid.description: You create a stream of hot acid in a 30 foot cone, centered on you. Pokémon caught in the cone must succeed on a DEX save, taking 2d6 poison damage on a fail, and half as much on a success. At Higher levels: Base damage increases to 4d6 At level 5, 6d6 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
Acid.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Acid Armor.description: You are surrounded by a shield of thick acid for the duration. During this time, your AC increases by 2, and any Pokémon that hits you with a melee attack must succeed on a CON save or take 1d6 poison damage. At Higher levels: Poison damage increases to 2d6 At level 10.
Acid Armor.level: magus 7, barbarian 7, warlock 7, ranger 7, paladin 7, alchemist 7, druid 7, bard 7, inquisitor 7, witch 7, summoner 7, monk 7, cleric 7, sorcerer 7, oracle 7, wizard 7

Agility.description: You hone in on your abilities and feel a surge of speed course through your veins. As long as you have the type, increase your walking, flying, or swimming speed by 20 feet for the duration.
Agility.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Amnesia.description: Your mind elevates to a new level of focus. Add +2 to any saving throw you make for the duration, but select one of your moves. You forget that move and cannot use it for the duration.
Amnesia.level: magus 7, barbarian 7, warlock 7, ranger 7, paladin 7, alchemist 7, druid 7, bard 7, inquisitor 7, witch 7, summoner 7, monk 7, cleric 7, sorcerer 7, oracle 7, wizard 7

Aurora Beam.description: You create a 40 foot line of freezing ice, 5 feet wide. Any creature caught in the line must succeed on a DEX save or take 3d6 ice damage and be frozen. At Higher levels: The damage done increases to 4d6 At level 5, 6d6 At level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
Aurora Beam.level: magus 7, barbarian 7, warlock 7, ranger 7, paladin 7, alchemist 7, druid 7, bard 7, inquisitor 7, witch 7, summoner 7, monk 7, cleric 7, sorcerer 7, oracle 7, wizard 7

Barrage.description: Make a ranged attak on a Pokémon, rolling 1d4 on a hit. You attack with a barrage of ranged strikes equal to the number shown. Each projectile does for 1d4 normal damage. At Higher levels: The damage of each projectile increases to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 1d10 at level 17.
Barrage.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Barrier.description: You create a transparent shield of psychic energy. While active, the barrier grants +2 to AC for you and any companions in a 5 foot radius, centered on you for the duration.
Barrier.level: magus 7, barbarian 7, warlock 7, ranger 7, paladin 7, alchemist 7, druid 7, bard 7, inquisitor 7, witch 7, summoner 7, monk 7, cleric 7, sorcerer 7, oracle 7, wizard 7

Bide.description: You embrace the damage done to you, waiting for your time to strike. Use your attack action to activate this move, and keep track of all damage done to you before your next turn. On your next turn, you lash out an an enemy with a normal ranged attack, striking them for double the amount of damage you took on a successful hit. At Higher levels: At 10th Level, you can choose to hold Bide for a second turn for the chance to add additional damage to the attack.
Bide.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Bind.description: You attempt to grapple a target into submission. Make a melee attack roll. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 + MOVE normal damage and is grappled and restrained. At the beginning of each of its turns, it may attempt to escape with a STR save against your Move DC. While a Pokémon is grappled, you may continue this move, as a bonus action, to do an automatic 1d10 + MOVE damage. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d12 at level 10.
Bind.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Bite.description: You sink your teeth into an enemy Pokémon. Make a melee attack roll, doing 1d8 + MOVE normal damage on a successful hit. At Higher levels: The base damage of the attack increases to 2d8 at level 5, 3d8 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
Bite.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Blizzard.description: Icy clouds form overhead and pelt the ground with hail and snow, centered on a point you choose within range. Each Pokémon within a 20 foot radius must make a Dexterity saving throw against your Move DC, taking 6d6 ice damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. At Higher levels: The damage increases to 7d6 at level 5, 8d6 at level 10, and 10d6 at level 17.
Blizzard.level: magus 7, barbarian 7, warlock 7, ranger 7, paladin 7, alchemist 7, druid 7, bard 7, inquisitor 7, witch 7, summoner 7, monk 7, cleric 7, sorcerer 7, oracle 7, wizard 7

Body Slam.description: You thrust yourself towards an opponent in an attempt to crush them with your physical size. Make a melee attack on a target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 + MOVE normal damage, and must succeed on a CON saving throw against your Move DC or be knocked prone. At Higher levels: The base damage of the attack increases to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d10 at level 17.
Body Slam.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Bone Club.description: You strike a Pokémon with a club of bone, doing 1d8 + MOVE on a successful hit. If the natural attack roll is 18 or more, the target flinches on their next turn. At Higher levels: The base damage of the attack increases to 1d10 at level 5, and 1d12 at level 10.
Bone Club.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Bonemerang.description: You throw a boomerang and make two ranges attacks against a target. On each successful hit, do 1d6 + MOVE ground damage. At Higher levels: The base damage of the attacks increase to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Bonemerang.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Bubble.description: You shoot a series of quickly moving bubbles at a target. Make three ranges attacks, doing 1d4 water damage on each successful hit. At Higher levels: The damage of each attack raises to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Bubble.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Bubblebeam.description: You shoot a concentrated stream of bubbles in an 80 foot line, 5 feet wide. Any Pokémon caught in the line must succeed on a DEX save against your Move DC, taking 3d6 water damage on a failed save, and half as much on a success. At Higher levels: The damage increases to 4d6 at level 5, 6d6 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
Bubblebeam.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Clamp.description: You clamp down on an enemy Pokémon, attempting to deal damage and keep them in place. Make a melee attack roll. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 + MOVE water damage and is grappled and restrained. At the beginning of each of its turns, it may attempt to pry itself away with a STR save against your Move DC. While a Pokémon is grappled, you may continue this move on consecutive turns without spending an additional PP. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d12 at level 10.
Clamp.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Comet Punch.description: You strike out with a lightning fast punch. Make a melee attack roll. The target takes 1d6 + MOVE on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, you may immediately hit again for an additional 1d6 normal damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll. At Higher levels: The damage dice for this attack increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Comet Punch.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Confuse Ray.description: You release a ray of psychic energy meant to confuse an opponent. Choose a target in range. The target must make an INT saving throw against your Move DC or take 2d6 psychic damage and become confused. At Higher levels: The damage increases to 4d6 at level 10.
Confuse Ray.level: magus 7, barbarian 7, warlock 7, ranger 7, paladin 7, alchemist 7, druid 7, bard 7, inquisitor 7, witch 7, summoner 7, monk 7, cleric 7, sorcerer 7, oracle 7, wizard 7

Confusion.description: You attempt to enter the mind of an enemy and cause confusion. Make a ranged attack on a Pokémon in range. On a hit, the target takes 2d10 psychic damage. If the natural attack roll is 15 or more, the target becomes confused. At Higher levels: At level 10, the damage increases to 2d12.
Confusion.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Constrict.description: You wrap yourself around an enemy Pokémon, trying to squeeze the life from them. Make a melee attack roll. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 + MOVE normal damage and is grappled and restrained. At the beginning of each of its turns, it may attempt to escape with a STR save against your Move DC. As long as it is restrained, continue to do 1d8 + MOVE on each of your turns without making an attack roll. At Higher levels: The base damage on the attack increases to 1d10 at level 5, and 1d12 at level 10.
Constrict.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Conversion.description: Your Pokémon takes on a new type for resistances and vulnerabilities, equal to one of the types of a move it currently knows.
Conversion.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Counter.description: If you are hit by a normal or fighting type attack, you can use your reaction to retaliate against your foe, doing 1d6 + MOVE fighting damage on a successful hit. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17
Counter.level: magus 2, barbarian 2, warlock 2, ranger 2, paladin 2, alchemist 2, druid 2, bard 2, inquisitor 2, witch 2, summoner 2, monk 2, cleric 2, sorcerer 2, oracle 2, wizard 2

Cut.description: You lash out at an enemy with vine or claw or blade. Make a melee roll on an enemy, doing 1d6 + MOVE on a successful hit. At Higher levels: The damage increases to 2d6 at level 5, 3d6 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
Cut.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Defense Curl.description: You curl up into a tight ball, increasing your defensive stance. Until your next turn, you gain + 4 to your AC and have resistance to normal attacks.
Defense Curl.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Dig.description: Your Pokémon burrows underground, disappearing from view before striking from underneath a foe. When you activate this move, you burrow underground and remain there until your next turn. During this time, you cannot be the target of any attack. On your next turn, make a melee attack on a pokemon in range, doing 3d6 ground damage on a successful hit. Flying creatures are unaffected by this attack. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 4d6 at level 5, 5d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
Dig.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Disable.description: You attempt to disable a Pokémon, hindering its abilities. Choose a target in range. The target must succeed on a WIS saving throw against your Move DC. On a fail, roll a d4. Each of the opponent’s moves is numbered 1 – 4 in alphabetical order. The move corresponding to the number rolled is unable to be activated for one minute. If the number rolled is higher than the number of moves known by the target Pokémon, reroll the d4 until you get a lower result.
Disable.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Dizzy Punch.description: You strike out with a devastating punch. Make a melee attack roll on a target, doing 1d8 + MOVE normal damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 18 or more, the target becomes confused. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d10 at level 5, and 1d12 at level 10. At level 17, a natural attack roll of 17 or more confuses the target.
Dizzy Punch.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Double Edge.description: When you are hit by a melee Attack, use your reaction to inflict 1d6 normal damage on the target. At Higher levels: The damage increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17
Double Edge.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Double Kick.description: You strike twice with two devastating kicks. Make two melee attack rolls, doing 1d6 + MOVE fighting damage on each successful hit. At Higher levels: The base damage for each kick increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Double Kick.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Double Slap.description: You reach out to slap a Pokémon with quick strikes. Make a melee attack roll, doing 1d6 + MOVE on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, you may immediately hit again for an additional 1d6 normal damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll. At Higher levels: The damage dice for this attack increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Double Slap.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Double Team.description: You create a duplicate image of yourself, 5 feet beside you. The image copies every move you make. When an enemy hits you with an attack, roll a d4. On a 3 or 4, the image takes all the damage for you and disappears.
Double Team.level: magus 7, barbarian 7, warlock 7, ranger 7, paladin 7, alchemist 7, druid 7, bard 7, inquisitor 7, witch 7, summoner 7, monk 7, cleric 7, sorcerer 7, oracle 7, wizard 7

Dragon Rage.description: You unleash a devastating flow of energy in a 100 foot long line, 5 feet wide. Each creature caught in the blast must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking 8d10 dragon damage on a fail, and half as much on a save.
Dragon Rage.level: magus 8, barbarian 8, warlock 8, ranger 8, paladin 8, alchemist 8, druid 8, bard 8, inquisitor 8, witch 8, summoner 8, monk 8, cleric 8, sorcerer 8, oracle 8, wizard 8

Dream Eater.description: You tap into a sleeping Pokémon’s dreams, sucking from its energy pool. Instantly inflict 2d6 psychic damage on a sleeping target in range, regaining half as many hitpoints to yourself. At Higher levels: The damage increases to 4d6 at level 5, 6d6 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
Dream Eater.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Drill Peck.description: You hammer down on an enemy with a peck attack. Make a melee attack roll on a target, doing 1d6 + MOVE on a successful hit. Drill Peck scores a critical hit on 19s and 20s. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Drill Peck.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, oracle 4

Earthquake.description: You create a tremor in the ground in a 10 foot radius, centered on you. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DEX save against your Move DC, taking 2d6 ground damage on a fail and be knocked prone. On a success, they take half as much damage and are not knocked prone. The area becomes difficult terrain. Flying Pokémon are immune to this attack. At Higher levels: The damage increases to 5d6 at level 5, 7d6 at level 10, and 10d6 at level 17.

Egg Bomb.description: You hurl a hard egg at a creature that explodes on impact. Make a ranged attack on a creature, doing 1d8 + MOVE normal damage on a successful hit. At Higher levels: The damage increases to 1d10 at level 5, and 1d12 at level 10.
Egg Bomb.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Ember.description: You hurl a ball of flame at an enemy within range. Make a ranged attack, doing 1d10 + Move fire damage on a successful hit. If the natural attack roll is 19 or 20, the target is burnt. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d10 at level 17.

Explosion.description: You create a sphere of energy that packs a concentrated and devastating explosion. Choose a target within range and roll a d20. On a 20, the explosion goes off and all Pokémon within 5 feet of that point faint On any other roll, the explosion fails to go off and this move has no effect.
Explosion.level: magus 9, barbarian 9, warlock 9, ranger 9, paladin 9, alchemist 9, druid 9, bard 9, inquisitor 9, witch 9, summoner 9, monk 9, cleric 9, sorcerer 9, oracle 9, wizard 9

Fire Blast.description: Raging hot flames explode out from you and leap towards two Pokémon in range. Pokémon targeted must succeed on a DEX save against your Move DC, taking 3d6 fire damage and becoming burnt on a fail, and half as much on a success without being burned. At Higher levels: Base damage increases to 4d6 At level 5, 5d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
Fire Blast.level: magus 7, barbarian 7, warlock 7, ranger 7, paladin 7, alchemist 7, druid 7, bard 7, inquisitor 7, witch 7, summoner 7, monk 7, cleric 7, sorcerer 7, oracle 7, wizard 7

At Higher levels: The damage dice for this attack increases to 2d8 at level 5, 2d10 at level 10, and 2d12 at level 17.

Fissure.description: You crack open the ground with devastating force. Choose a target in range and roll a d20. On a 20, the target falls into the crack and vanished into the abyss. On any other roll, or if targeting a flying creature, this move has no effect. The area in a 20 foot radius around the target becomes difficult terrain.

Flamethrower.description: You shoot a concentrated gout of flame in an 40 foot cone. Any Pokémon caught in the cone must succeed on a DEX save against your Move DC, taking 3d6 fire damage and being burnt on a failed save, or half damage on a success. At Higher levels: The damage increases to 4d6 at level 5, 6d6 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.

Flash.description: You emit an immense flash of light in a 10 foot radius circle, centered on you. Pokémon in the area must make a CON save against your Move DC. On a fail, they are blinded.
Flash.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Fly.description: You fly high into the air to prepare for a dive bomb attack. When you activate this move, you flap your wings and disappear into the Ethereal plane above you. You cannot be targeted by attacks while you are in the Ethereal plane. On your next turn, you use your action to reappear and make a diving melee attack on a Pokémon in range, doing doing 3d6 flying damage on a successful hit. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 4d6 at level 5, 5d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.

Fury Attack.description: You reach out and unleash relentless strikes against a Pokémon. Make a melee attack roll, doing 1d6 + MOVE on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, you may immediately hit again for an additional 1d6 normal damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll. At Higher levels: The damage dice for this attack increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Fury Attack.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

At Higher levels: The damage dice for this attack increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.

Glare.description: You stare into the depths of a Pokémon’s eyes with intense ferocity. The Pokémon must make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC or be paralyzed for the duration. A creature that succeeds on this saving throw is unaffected by future attempts during this combat.
Glare.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Growl.description: You target a Pokémon with an intimidating growl. The Pokémon must make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a fail, it adds -1 to any attack it makes for the duration. This modifier can be stacked if it fails multiple growl saves, up to a maximum of -5.

Growth.description: You increase the size of an ally Pokémon. When you use this move, a Pokémon in range (or you) grows slightly larger, gaining the ability to add a d4 to any attack roll or saving throw for the duration. At Higher levels: The dice to add increases to 1d6 at level 10.
Growth.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Guillotine.description: You are filled with an incredible rage, grabbing the head of an enemy Pokémon in an attempt to squeeze the life from it. Roll a d20. On a 20, you instantly cause the Pokémon to faint. On any other roll, this move has no effect.
Guillotine.level: magus 9, barbarian 9, warlock 9, ranger 9, paladin 9, alchemist 9, druid 9, bard 9, inquisitor 9, witch 9, summoner 9, monk 9, cleric 9, sorcerer 9, oracle 9, wizard 9

Gust.description: You create a strong wind that batters enemy Pokémon. Make a ranged attack on a single Pokémon, doing 1d6 + MOVE normal damage on a hit. At Higher levels: The damage dice for this attack increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Gust.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Harden.description: You increase your defense, adding + 1 to your AC. This effect can be stacked with multiple Harden moves, to a maximum of + 5 AC. Your AC returns to normal after combat.
Harden.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Haze.description: You create a haze of light snow that washes over the Pokémon in range. Any stat bonuses or modifiers, status effects, shields or other outside forces effecting the stats or abilities of a Pokémon are removed. This includes things like Leech Seed, Reflect, and Light Screen.
Haze.level: magus 7, barbarian 7, warlock 7, ranger 7, paladin 7, alchemist 7, druid 7, bard 7, inquisitor 7, witch 7, summoner 7, monk 7, cleric 7, sorcerer 7, oracle 7, wizard 7

Headbutt.description: You really know how to use your head. Make a melee attack roll, doing 1d6 + MOVE normal damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 18 or more, the target falls prone. At Higher levels: The damage dice for this attack increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Headbutt.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Hi Jump Kick.description: You leap into the air to deliver a strong kick to the enemy. Make a melee attack against a Pokémon, doing 1d10 + MOVE fighting damage on a hit. On a miss, you take 1 damage. At Higher levels: The damage for this attack increases to 2d10 at level 10.
Hi Jump Kick.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Horn Attack.description: You strike at an enemy with your horn. Make a melee attack, doing 1d6 + MOVE on a hit. If you moved 20 feet or more towards an enemy on this turn, do an additional 1d6 damage and force the enemy to make a STR save against your Move DC or be knocked prone. At Higher levels: The base damage for both the horn and charge attack increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17
Horn Attack.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Horn Drill.description: You attempt to drill your horn through an enemy Pokémon with tremendous strength. Roll a d20. On a 20, the Pokémon is impaled and immediately faints. On any other roll, you miss and this move fails.
Horn Drill.level: magus 9, barbarian 9, warlock 9, ranger 9, paladin 9, alchemist 9, druid 9, bard 9, inquisitor 9, witch 9, summoner 9, monk 9, cleric 9, sorcerer 9, oracle 9, wizard 9

Hydro Pump.description: You send a surge of powerful water towards enemy Pokémon in an 80 foot line, 5 feet wide. Pokémon caught in the blast must succeed on a DEX save against your Move DC, taking 4d6 water damage on a failed save, and half as much on a success. Pokémon that fail the save also are pushed back 10 feet and fall prone. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 6d6 at level 5, 8d6 at level 10, and 10d6 at level 17.
Hydro Pump.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Hyper Beam.description: You unleash a concentrated beam of pure energy at a Pokémon in range, doing 8d8 normal damage on a hit. The beam is unavailable the next turn and must be recharged before you can use it again. At Higher levels: The damage increases to 10d8 at level 17.
Hyper Beam.level: magus 8, barbarian 8, warlock 8, ranger 8, paladin 8, alchemist 8, druid 8, bard 8, inquisitor 8, witch 8, summoner 8, monk 8, cleric 8, sorcerer 8, oracle 8, wizard 8

Hyper Fang.description: You lash out at a Pokémon with a quick fang attack. Make a melee attack roll, doing 1d10 + MOVE on a hit. Hyper Fang scores a critical hit on 19 and 20. If the natural attack roll is 18 or more, the target flinches on their next turn. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d12 at level 10.
Hyper Fang.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Hypnosis.description: You attempt to put the target to sleep. The target must make a WIS save against your Move DC, falling asleep on a failure.
Hypnosis.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Ice Beam.description: You send a concentrated beam of freezing ice at a singe Pokémon in range. Make a ranged attack roll, doing 4d6 ice damage on a hit, and forcing the target to make a CON save against your Move DC or become frozen. At Higher levels: The damage increases to 6d6 at level 5, 8d6 at level 10, and 10d6 at level 17.
Ice Beam.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Ice Punch.description: You strike out with ice-infused fists. Make a melee attack roll, doing 1d6 + Move normal damage and an additional 1d4 ice damage. At Higher levels: The fire damage increases to 2d4 at level 5, 2d6 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
Ice Punch.level: magus 9, barbarian 9, warlock 9, ranger 9, paladin 9, alchemist 9, druid 9, bard 9, inquisitor 9, witch 9, summoner 9, monk 9, cleric 9, sorcerer 9, oracle 9, wizard 9

Jump Kick.description: You leap into the air to deliver a strong kick to the enemy. Make a melee attack against a Pokémon, doing 1d8 + MOVE fighting damage on a hit. On a miss, you take 1 damage. At Higher levels: The damage for this attack increases to 2d8 at level 10.
Jump Kick.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Karate Chop.description: You extend a hand towards an enemy Pokémon for a savage karate chop. Make a melee Attack roll, doing 1d6 + MOVE normal damage on a hit. Karate Chop scores a critical hit on 19s and 20s. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 6d6 at level 5, 8d6 at level 10, and 10d6 at level 17.
Karate Chop.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Kinesis.description: You move with incredible speed. Increase your walking, flying, or swimming speed by 20 if it is greater than 0, and add +2 to AC when targeted by ranged attacks for the duration. This move cannot be stacked.
Kinesis.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Leech Life.description: You attempt to suck away some of an enemy Pokémon’s life force. Make a melee attack roll, doing 2d4 on a hit. Half of the damage done is restored to the user. At Higher levels: The damage increases to 2d6 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 2d12 at level 17.
Leech Life.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Leech Seed.description: You send a seed at a Pokémon in range that implants itself in their hide. Make a ranged attack roll. On a hit, a seed implants into their skin. The target takes 1d4 grass damage at the end of each of its subsequent turns until it faints or is switched out. Half of the damage is restored by the attacker, or any other active Pokémon the trainer has in battle, even if the original attacker faints or is returned to its Pokéball. Only one Pokémon can be seeded by the attacker at a time. At Higher levels: The di used for the initial and recurring damages is changed to a d6 at level 10 and a d8 at level 17.
Leech Seed.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Leer.description: You stare down an enemy Pokémon, reducing its will. The Pokémon must make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a fail, allies may add +1 to any attack they target it with for the duration. This modifier can be stacked if it fails multiple leer saves, up to a maximum of +5.
Leer.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Lick.description: You reach out and lick an enemy Pokémon. Make a melee attack roll. On a hit, do 1d6 + MOVE ghost damage, and force the enemy to make a CON save against your Move DC or become paralyzed. At Higher levels: The base damage for this attack increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17
Lick.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Light Screen.description: A shield of light forms in front of you, blocking incoming attacks. For the duration, you have resistance to all fire, grass, ice, water, poison, and ghost type moves. If you were vulnerable to any of these types before activating this move, you take regular damage instead of double.
Light Screen.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Lovely Kiss.description: You blow a kiss to a Pokémon, attempting to put the target to sleep. The target must make a CHA save against your Move DC, falling asleep on a failure.
Lovely Kiss.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Low Kick.description: You kick out at a Pokémon’s lower half, dealing damage and attempting to knock it off balance. Make a melee attack, doing 1d6 + MOVE fighting damage on a hit. The target must make a STR save against your Move DC or be knocked prone. If the natural attack roll is 18 or more, the target flinches on their next turn. At Higher levels: The base damage for this attack increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Low Kick.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Meditate.description: You become one with your inner self. For the duration, double your proficiency bonus when it comes to attack rolls and saving throws. This move cannot be stacked.
Meditate.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Mega Drain.description: You attempt to drain the life force of an enemy Pokémon. Make a ranged attack on a target, doing 1d10 + MOVE grass damage on a hit. Half of the damage dealt is restored to the user. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d10 at level 17.
Mega Drain.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Mega Kick.description: You strike out with a hard kick. Make a melee attack against a target, doing 2d4 + MOVE normal damage on a hit. At Higher levels: The base damage for this attack increases to 2d6 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 2d10 at level 17.
Mega Kick.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Mega Punch.description: You strike out with a hard punch. Make a melee attack against a target, doing 2d4 + MOVE normal damage on a hit. At Higher levels: The base damage for this attack increases to 2d6 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 2d10 at level 17.
Mega Punch.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Metronome.description: You summon a move at random to inflict against the enemy. When you use this move, roll a d100. If it is above 50, divide by 2 (rounding down). The resulting number is the TM number for the move you make. If the move is unable to be completed because of positioning, range, etc., Metronome fails.
Metronome.level: magus 7, barbarian 7, warlock 7, ranger 7, paladin 7, alchemist 7, druid 7, bard 7, inquisitor 7, witch 7, summoner 7, monk 7, cleric 7, sorcerer 7, oracle 7, wizard 7

Mimic.description: You copy another Pokémon’s movements, learning its ways in battle. When used, this move is temporarily replaced by your choice of one of the target's moves. The target can be an ally. After one PP is subtracted to use this move, the replacement move will retain Mimic's remaining PP. The user can select any of the target's moves to copy for the duration.
Mimic.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Minimize.description: You appear smaller to enemy Pokémon, increasing your evasion. For the duration, you gain an additional +2 to your AC.
Minimize.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Mirror Move.description: You perform the same move made by a chosen target after your last turn, using your own statistics for bonuses and Move saves if applicable.
Mirror Move.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Mist.description: A light mist surrounds a target, offering a protective barrier. The target is immune to negative stat effects or modifier changes for the duration, but any current effects are still in place.
Mist.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Mud Slap.description: You hurl mud at an enemy Pokémon. Make a ranged attack roll, doing 1d6 + MOVE ground damage on a hit. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Mud Slap.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Night Shade.description: You hit an enemy with a necrotic wave of dark energy. Make a ranged attack against a target. On a hit, the damage is equal to 1d6 + the user’s level. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Night Shade.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Pay Day.description: You strike a Pokémon, causing it to shake out its purse. Make a melee attack on a Pokémon, doing 1d6 + MOVE on a hit. In addition, 5x the user’s level in cash is scattered on the floor until the end of combat. This feature can only happen once per Pokémon per combat. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Pay Day.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Peck.description: You hammer down on an enemy with a peck attack. Make a melee attack roll on a target, doing 1d6 + MOVE on a successful hit. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Peck.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Petal Dance.description: You dance around, releasing a flurry of sharp leaf attacks against a Pokémon in range. Make a ranged attack roll, doing 1d6 + MOVE nature damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, another leaf hits again for an additional 1d6 nature damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll. At Higher levels: The damage dice for this attack increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Petal Dance.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Pin Missile.description: You strike a Pokémon with sharp projectiles in quick succession. Make a ranged attack roll, doing 1d6 + MOVE bug damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, another projectile hits again for an additional 1d6 bug damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll. At Higher levels: The damage dice for this attack increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Pin Missile.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Poison Gas.description: You release a toxic cloud of poisonous gas in a 10 foot radius, centered on a point within range. Any creature that starts their turn in this are must succeed on a CON save against your Move DC, taking 3d6 poison damage and becoming poisoned on a fail, or half as much damage without being poisoned on a save. At Higher levels: The damage increases to 4d6 at level 5, 6d6 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
Poison Gas.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Poison Powder.description: You release a cluster of poisonous spores that burst into the air above a Pokémon. The Pokémon must succeed on a CON save against your Move DC, becoming poisoned on a fail.
Poison Powder.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Poison Sting.description: You strike out at a Pokémon with a poisonous sting. Make a melee attack role against a target, doing 1d6 + MOVE poison damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 15 or more, the Pokémon is poisoned. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Poison Sting.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Pound.description: You crush an opponent with a pound attack. Make a melee attack roll against a target, doing 1d6 + MOVE normal damage on a hit. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Pound.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Psybeam.description: You send a beam of invisible, psychic energy at a target in range. The target must make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC, taking 2d8 psychic damage and becoming confused on a fail, and half as much without becoming confused on a save. At Higher levels: The damage increases to 3d8 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 5d8 at level 17.
Psybeam.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Psychic.description: You tap into a Pokémon’s mind, damaging their will to fight. Make a ranged attack on a Pokémon in range, doing 4d6 + MOVE psychic damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 18 or higher, the target becomes confused. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 4d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
Psychic.level: magus 7, barbarian 7, warlock 7, ranger 7, paladin 7, alchemist 7, druid 7, bard 7, inquisitor 7, witch 7, summoner 7, monk 7, cleric 7, sorcerer 7, oracle 7, wizard 7

Psywave.description: You emit a wave of psychic energy in a 40 foot line, 5 feet wide. Each Pokémon caught in the wave must make a WIS save against your Move DC, becoming confused on a fail.
Psywave.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Quick Attack.description: You lash out with a quick unarmed strike at a Pokémon in range, doing 1d4 + Move normal damage on a hit. As a bonus action, you can immediately move and attack another Pokémon in range without taking an attack of opportunity, doing 1d4 normal damage on a hit. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 1d10 at level 17.
Quick Attack.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Rage.description: You go into a fit of rage, attacking with relentless fury. While you are raging, you gain +2 on all damage rolls, have resistance to normal damage, and have advantage on all Strength checks. Your rage ends if you faint or if you have not attacked a hostile target since your last turn, or taken any damage since then. At Higher levels: Your increase in damage is equal to +4 at level 5, +6 at level 10, and +8 at level 17.
Rage.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Rain Dance.description: You summon a heavy rainfall that covers the battlefield, boosting water type Pokémon abilities.
Rain Dance.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Razor Leaf.description: You send a razor sharp leaf at a Pokémon in range at tremendous speed. Make a ranged attack roll, doing 1d6 + MOVE grass damage on a hit. Razor Leaf results in a critical hit on 19s and 20s At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Razor Leaf.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Razor Wind.description: When you use this move, strong winds begin to circle around you, granting +2 to AC. On your next turn, if you keep your concentration, you release those winds in a 20 foot radius, centered on you. Each Pokémon in the area must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking 5d6 normal damage on a fail, or half as much on a success. At Higher levels: The damage increases to 6d6 at level 5, 7d6 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17
Razor Wind.level: magus 7, barbarian 7, ranger 7, paladin 7, alchemist 7, druid 7, inquisitor 7, witch 7, summoner 7, monk 7, cleric 7, oracle 7, wizard 7

Recover.description: You extend a healing energy to recover the hit points of a Pokémon in range. The target regains 1d6 + MOVE hit points. At Higher levels: You heal a base 2d6 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
Recover.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Reflect.description: When you are hit by a melee attack, use your reaction to take half the damage dealt.
Reflect.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Rest.description: You put yourself to sleep, but gain 2d6 + MOVE hit points in the process. At Higher levels: You heal a base 4d6 at level 5, 6d6 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
Rest.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Roar.description: You release an intimidating roar at a Pokémon in range. The target must make a CHA save against your Move DC, fleeing from battle on fail. You gain no experience from a fleeing Pokémon, and the move automatically fails in trainer battles. A creature that succeeds on this saving throw is unaffected by future attempts during this combat.
Roar.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Rock Slide.description: Large boulders appear above an enemy Pokémon in range, crashing down on top of them. The target must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking 2d6 rock damage and falling prone on a failed save, and half as much without falling prone on a success. At Higher levels: The damage increases to 4d6 at level 5, 6d6 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
Rock Slide.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Rock Throw.description: You hurl a rock at an enemy Pokémon. Make a ranged attack roll, doing 1d6 + MOVE rock damage on a hit. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Rock Throw.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, oracle 4

Rolling Kick.description: You swing your feet around in a wide arc to strike a foe. Make a melee attack roll, doing 1d6 + MOVE fighting damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 18 or more, the target flinches on their next turn. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Rolling Kick.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Sand Attack.description: You kick up a cloud of sand in an attempt to blind a target in range. The target must make a CON save against your Move DC. On a fail, for the remainder of the encounter, they add -1 to all of their attack rolls. This move can be stacked for a maximum of -5 to attack rolls.
Sand Attack.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Scratch.description: You slash out at a Pokémon in range. Make a melee attack, doing 1d6 + MOVE normal damage on a hit. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Scratch.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Screech.description: You let out a horrible screech at enemy Pokémon in a 20 foot radius, centered on you, distracting them and opening up their defenses. The Pokémon must make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a fail, allies add +1 to any attack they target an effected Pokémon with for the duration. This modifier can be stacked if a Pokémon fails multiple screech saves, up to a maximum of +5.
Screech.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Seismic Toss.description: You attempt to throw a Pokémon into the ground with tremendous force. Make a melee attack roll, doing fighting damage equal to the opponent’s level on a hit, double on a critical hit. Seismic Toss results in a critical hit on 19s and 20s.
Seismic Toss.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Self Destruct.description: You release a massive explosion in a 30 foot radius, fainting immediately after the attack. Creatures in the area must make a DEX save against your Move DC. If your Pokémon has at least half its hit points left, anyone in range takes 8d6 normal damage on a fail, or half as much on a success. If your creature has less than half of its hitpoints left, the damage is halved for a success or fail. At Higher levels: Damage increases to 8d8 at level 5, 8d10 at level 10, and 8d12 at level 17.
Self Destruct.level: magus 9, barbarian 9, warlock 9, ranger 9, paladin 9, alchemist 9, druid 9, bard 9, inquisitor 9, witch 9, summoner 9, monk 9, cleric 9, sorcerer 9, oracle 9, wizard 9

Sharpen.description: You collect your focus, sharpening your combat skills. You may add 1d4 to any attack roll for the duration. At Higher levels: At level 10, the dice you can add changes to 1d6
Sharpen.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Sing.description: You sing a beautiful song in an attempt to put enemy Pokémon to to sleep. Roll 5d8; the total is how many hit points of Pokémon this spell can affect. Pokémon within 30 feet of you are affected in ascending order of their current hit points. Starting with the Pokémon that has the lowest current hit points, each Pokémon affected by this spell falls asleep. Subtract each Pokémon’s hit points from the total before moving on to the Pokémon with the next lowest hit points. A Pokémon’s hit points must be equal to or less than the remaining total for that creature to be affected. At Higher levels: Roll 7d8 for hitpoints at level 5, 9d8 at level 10, and 11d8 at level 17.
Sing.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Skull Bash.description: When you use this move, you lower your head and prepare to strike a foe within range. On your next turn’s action, if you keep your concentration, you charge at a Pokémon in range ignoring your walking speed and any opportunity attacks you may incur. Make a melee attack roll, doing 5d6 + MOVE on a hit. A Pokémon hit with this attack much succeed on a STR saving throw against your Move DC or be knocked prone. At Higher levels: The damage increases to 6d6 at level 5, 7d6 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17
Skull Bash.level: magus 7, barbarian 7, warlock 7, ranger 7, paladin 7, alchemist 7, druid 7, bard 7, inquisitor 7, witch 7, summoner 7, monk 7, cleric 7, sorcerer 7, oracle 7, wizard 7

Sky Attack.description: When you use this move, you flap your wings menacingly and prepare to strike a foe within range. On your next turn’s action, if you keep your concentration, you dive at a Pokémon in range, ignoring your flying speed and any opportunity attacks you may incur. Make a melee attack roll, doing 5d6 + MOVE on a hit. At Higher levels: The damage increases to 6d6 at level 5, 7d6 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17
Sky Attack.level: magus 7, barbarian 7, warlock 7, ranger 7, paladin 7, alchemist 7, druid 7, bard 7, inquisitor 7, witch 7, summoner 7, monk 7, cleric 7, sorcerer 7, oracle 7, wizard 7

Slam.description: You crush an opponent with a slam attack. Make a melee attack roll against a target, doing 1d6 + MOVE normal damage on a hit. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Slam.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Slash.description: You slash out at a Pokémon in range. Make a melee attack, doing 1d8 + MOVE normal damage on a hit. Slash results in a critical hit on 19s and 20s. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d10 at level 5, and 1d10 at level 10..
Slash.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Sleep Powder.description: You release a cluster of spores at a Pokémon in range, attempting to put them to sleep. The target must make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC or fall asleep.
Sleep Powder.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Sludge.description: You spew poisonous sludge at an enemy Pokémon in range. Make a ranged attack on a Pokémon, doing 2d6 + MOVE poison damage on a hit. The creature must make a CON save against your Move DC or become poisoned. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 3d6 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 5d6 at level 17.
Sludge.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Smog.description: You create a fog of poisonous smog in a 15 foot radius, centered on a point within range. Creatures that begin their turn in the area take 1d6 + MOVE poison damage and must succeed on a CON save against your Move DC or become poisoned. The area of smog is considered difficult terrain, and any attacks make from inside it are done at disadvantage. At Higher levels: The base damage inside the smog increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Smog.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Smokescreen.description: You conjur a line of smoke on the battlefield, 60 feet long and 5 feet thick. The area on either side is obscured and imposes disadvantage on any ranged attacks made by a Pokémon targeting another on the opposite side. Any Pokémon inside the wall of smoke must make a CON save against your Move DC or become blinded for the duration.
Smokescreen.level: magus 7, barbarian 7, warlock 7, ranger 7, paladin 7, alchemist 7, druid 7, bard 7, inquisitor 7, witch 7, summoner 7, monk 7, cleric 7, sorcerer 7, oracle 7, wizard 7

Soft-Boiled.description: Heal a Pokémon in range for 2d6 + MOVE hitpoints. At Higher levels: The base healing increases to 3d6 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 5d6 at level 17.
Soft-Boiled.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Solar Beam.description: When you use this move, soak in solar energy and prepare to unleash a devastating beam. On your next turn, if you keep your concentration, you create a 60 foot line of solar energy, 5 feet wide. Any creature caught in the line must succeed on a DEX save or take 6d6 grass damage on a fail and half as much on a save. If this move in used in daylight, the damage increases by 2d6. At Higher levels: The damage done increases to 8d6 At level 5, 10d6 At level 10, and 12d6 at level 17.
Solar Beam.level: magus 7, barbarian 7, warlock 7, ranger 7, paladin 7, alchemist 7, druid 7, bard 7, inquisitor 7, witch 7, summoner 7, monk 7, cleric 7, sorcerer 7, oracle 7, wizard 7

Sonic Boom.description: You unleash a deafening sound that harms Pokémon in a 20 foot circle, centered on you. Pokémon in range must make a CON save against your Move DC, taking 20 flat damage on a fail.
Sonic Boom.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Spike Cannon.description: You fire a series of sharp spikes at a Pokémon in range. Make a ranged attack roll, doing 1d6 + MOVE normal damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, you may immediately hit again for an additional 1d6 normal damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll. At Higher levels: The damage dice for this attack increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Spike Cannon.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Splash.description: You flail around on the ground, doing no damage and looking ridiculous, but your jump speed becomes 50 feet.
Splash.level: magus 2, barbarian 2, warlock 2, ranger 2, paladin 2, alchemist 2, druid 2, bard 2, inquisitor 2, witch 2, summoner 2, monk 2, cleric 2, sorcerer 2, oracle 2, wizard 2

Spore.description: When you are hit by a melee attack, you can use your reaction to release a spore that attempts to put your attacker to sleep. The Pokémon must make a WIS save against your Move DC, falling asleep on a fail.
Spore.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Spotlight.description: You shine a bright light on a Pokémon in range that follows them around the battlefield. The target must make a DEX save against your Move DC. On a fail, attacks against that Pokémon have advantage for the duration.
Spotlight.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Stomp.description: You raise your feet up for a stomp attack. Make a melee attack roll against a Pokémon, doing 1d6 + MOVE on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 18 or more, the target flinches on their next turn. At Higher levels: The damage dice for this attack increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Stomp.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Stone Edge.description: The earth moves beneath an enemy’s feet as sharp stone pierce through the ground underneath them. Pokémon in a 10 foot radius centered on a point you choose in range must make a DEX save against your MOVE DC, taking 4d6 rock damage on a fail, or half as much on a save. At Higher levels: The damage increases to 5d6 at level 5, 6d6 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
Stone Edge.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Strength.description: You strike out at a Pokémon with brute strength. Make a melee attack roll against a Pokémon, doing 1d6 + MOVE on a hit. On a hit, you may also choose to push the Pokémon 5 feet away. At Higher levels: The damage dice for this attack increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Strength.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

String Shot.description: You unleash sticky string at a Pokémon in range, slowing it down. Make a ranged attack roll against a target. On a hit, the target’s primary speed is reduced by 10 for the duration. If this reduction in speed causes their speed to be 0, they are restrained.
String Shot.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Struggle.description: This move is known by all Pokémon, and is used only when all other moves are out of PP. Make a melee attack roll, doing damage equal to your STR modifier on a hit.
Struggle.level: magus 1, barbarian 1, warlock 1, ranger 1, paladin 1, alchemist 1, druid 1, bard 1, inquisitor 1, witch 1, summoner 1, monk 1, cleric 1, sorcerer 1, oracle 1, wizard 1

Stun Spore.description: When you are hit by a melee attack, you can use your reaction to release a spore that attempts to stun your attacker. The Pokémon must make a WIS save against your Move DC, becoming paralyzed on a fail.
Stun Spore.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Submission.description: You attempt a forceful grapple on a target. Make a melee attack roll against a Pokémon, doing 1d6 + MOVE fighting damage on a hit. The target is grappled and restrained. If the target is still grappled by you on future turns, you may use this move as a bonus action to immediately inflict another 1d6 + MOVE damage. At Higher levels: The damage dice for this attack increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Submission.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Substitute.description: You create a duplicate of yourself with ¼ the HP (rounded down). This substitute has an AC of 1 and takes all damage and status ailments you would normally take until it is destroyed. If the damage done is enough to destroy the substitute, you take the remaining damage.
Substitute.level: magus 7, barbarian 7, warlock 7, ranger 7, paladin 7, alchemist 7, druid 7, bard 7, inquisitor 7, witch 7, summoner 7, monk 7, cleric 7, sorcerer 7, oracle 7, wizard 7

Super Fang.description: You lash out with an incredible fang attack. Make a melee attack, doing 2d6 normal damage on a hit. On critical hits, instead of doubling the dice, you can choose to do damage equal to half the target’s HP. At Higher levels: The base damage for this attack increases to 3d6 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 5d6 at level 17.
Super Fang.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Supersonic.description: You emit a high pitched screech heard only by the target. The target becomes confused.
Supersonic.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Surf.description: A wave of high-pressured water moves you to strike a Pokémon in range. Choose a target. You appear within 5 feet of that target, ignoring opportunity attacks, and make a melee attack roll. On a hit, you do 2d6 + MOVE water damage. At Higher levels: The damage increases to 3d6 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 5d6 at level 17.
Surf.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Swift.description: You fire three projectiles at any Pokémon you choose in range. They do not have to target the same Pokémon. Each hit for 1d4 + 2 normal damage. This move also targets Pokémon in the middle of dig or fly moves. At Higher levels: You fire four projectiles at level 5, five at level 10, and 6 at level 18.
Swift.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Swords Dance.description: When you activate this move, three swords appear and dance around you. As a bonus action on future turns, you can attack and send one of the swords at an enemy Pokémon within 30 feet of you, doing 1d6 + MOVE normal damage on a hit. In addition, your AC is increased by +1 for each sword around you. At Higher levels: You create 4 swords at level 5, 5 swords at level 10, and 6 swords at level 17.
Swords Dance.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Synthesis.description: You regenerate from the inside, healing some of your wounds. Heal yourself for 4d6 + MOVE hit points.
Synthesis.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Tackle.description: Make a melee attack roll against a Pokémon, doing 1d6 + MOVE on a hit. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Tackle.level: magus 3, barbarian 3, warlock 3, ranger 3, paladin 3, alchemist 3, druid 3, bard 3, inquisitor 3, witch 3, summoner 3, monk 3, cleric 3, sorcerer 3, oracle 3, wizard 3

Tail Whip.description: You shake your tail at an enemy Pokémon, distracting it and opening up its defenses. The Pokémon must make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a fail, allies add +1 to any attack they target it with for the duration. This modifier can be stacked if it fails multiple tail whip saves, up to a maximum of +5.
Tail Whip.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Take Down.description: You sacrifice your own position to take down and enemy Pokémon. Roll a melee attack roll. On a hit, you do 2d8 + MOVE normal damage and both you and the target are knocked prone. At Higher levels: The damage increases to 3d8 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 5d8 at level 17.
Take Down.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Teleport.description: You disappear from view and reappear at an unoccupied point within range. In wild Pokémon battles, this move can be activated to automatically count as a single success in a group DEX check to run away.
Teleport.level: magus 7, barbarian 7, ranger 7, paladin 7, alchemist 7, inquisitor 7, witch 7, summoner 7, monk 7, oracle 7, wizard 7

Thrash.description: You thrash about wildly, doing several attacks without control. Make a melee attack roll, doing 1d6 + MOVE normal damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, you may immediately hit again for an additional 1d6 normal damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll. At the end of this attack, you become confused. At Higher levels: The damage dice for this attack increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
