Thunder.description: Powerful electric energy arcs out from you, hitting any Pokémon in a 20 foot radius, centered on you. Pokémon caught in the area must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking 4d6 electric damage on a fail, and half as much on a success. At Higher levels: The damage increases to 5d6 at level 5, 6d6 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
Thunder.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Thunder Punch.description: Your punches are imbued with electric energy. Make a melee attack on a Pokémon, doing 1d6 + MOVE electric damage on a hit. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Thunder Punch.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Thunder Wave.description: You send a wave of electric energy that surrounds a Pokémon in range. The Pokémon must make a CON save against your Move DC or become paralyzed.
Thunder Wave.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Thunderbolt.description: You send a powerful bolt of electricity at a Pokémon in range. Make a ranged attack roll, doing 1d8 + MOVE electric damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the target is paralyzed. At Higher levels: The damage increases to 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Thunderbolt.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Thundershock.description: You deliver an electric shock to an enemy Pokemon in range. Make a melee attack on a Pokémon, doing 1d6 + MOVE electric damage on a hit. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
Thundershock.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Toxic.description: You send a downpour of potent, poisonous rain in a 5 foot radius, centered on a point within range. Targets in the area must make a CON save against your MOVE DC or become poisoned. Pokémon poisoned by this move take double the normal poison damage.
Toxic.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Transform.description: You attempt to morph into a near-exact copy of a Pokémon in range, as long as the base CR of the Pokémon is able to be controlled by your trainer. For the duration, you copy all of the Pokémon’s stats and current moves, keeping your own HP and level.
Transform.level: magus 7, barbarian 7, warlock 7, ranger 7, paladin 7, alchemist 7, druid 7, bard 7, inquisitor 7, witch 7, summoner 7, monk 7, cleric 7, sorcerer 7, oracle 7, wizard 7

Tri Attack.description: You strike out with three quick attacks. Make three melee attack rolls, doing 1d6 + MOVE damage on each hit. At Higher levels: The base damage on a hit increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 12.
Tri Attack.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Twineedle.description: You fire two sharp projectiles at Pokémon in range. Make two melee attack rolls, doing 1d6 + MOVE damage on each hit. At Higher levels: The base damage on a hit increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 12
Twineedle.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Vice Grip.description: You crush an opponent with a forceful, gripping attack. Make a melee attack, doing 1d12 + MOVE normal damage on a hit, grappling the opponent. On each successive turn, if the Pokémon is still grappled, you may use this move again and automatically hit. At Higher levels: At level 10, the base damage increases to 2d12.
Vice Grip.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Vine Whip.description: You extend a sharp vine to whip the opponent with. Make a melee attack roll, doing 2d6 + MOVE grass damage on a hit. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 3d6 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 5d6 at level 17.
Vine Whip.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Water Gun.description: You fire a quick spurt of water at a Pokémon in range. Make a ranged attack roll, doing 1d6 + MOVE water damage on a hit. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17
Water Gun.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Waterfall.description: You create an intense waterfall that crashes down upon enemy Pokémon in a 10 foot radius, centered on a point within range. Pokémon in the area must make a DEX save against your Move DC or take 4d6 water damage and fall prone on a fail, or half as much on a save. At Higher levels: The damage increases to 5d6 at level 5, 6d6 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
Waterfall.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Whirlwind.description: You create a whirlwind of spinning air around you, increasing your AC by +2. In wild Pokémon battles, this move can be activated to automatically count as a single success in a group DEX check to run away.
Whirlwind.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Wing Attack.description: You strike out at an enemy Pokémon with your wings. Make a ranged attack roll, doing 1d6 + MOVE flying damage on a hit. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17
Wing Attack.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4

Withdraw.description: When hit by a melee or ranged attack, you can spend your reaction to increase your AC by +2 if it would cause the Attack to miss. At Higher levels: At level 10, you can increase your AC by +3.
Withdraw.level: magus 6, barbarian 6, warlock 6, ranger 6, paladin 6, alchemist 6, druid 6, bard 6, inquisitor 6, witch 6, summoner 6, monk 6, cleric 6, sorcerer 6, oracle 6, wizard 6

Wrap.description: You attempt to grapple a target into submission. Make a melee attack roll. On a hit, the target takes 1d4 + MOVE normal damage and is grappled and restrained. At the beginning of each of its turns, it may attempt to escape with a STR save against your Move DC. While a Pokémon is grappled, you may continue this move as a bonus action, doing an automatic 1d4 + MOVE normal damage. At Higher levels: The base damage increases to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 1d10 at level 17.
Wrap.level: magus 4, barbarian 4, warlock 4, ranger 4, paladin 4, alchemist 4, druid 4, bard 4, inquisitor 4, witch 4, summoner 4, monk 4, cleric 4, sorcerer 4, oracle 4, wizard 4
